description:
The investment seeks to track the total return performance, before fees and expenses, of the BlueStar Augmented and Virtual Reality Index (the "index").
 Under normal circumstances, at least 80% of the fund's total assets (exclusive of any collateral held from securities lending) will be invested in the component securities of the index or in depositary receipts representing such component securities. The index consists of a modified equal-weighted portfolio of the stock of companies whose products or services are predominantly tied to the development or commercialization of augmented or virtual reality technologies. The fund is non-diversified.
